DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Director Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 11:49 IST
 Dedicated Freight Corridor Corporation of India
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 180,000 to 340,000




FOLLOW

The Dedicated Freight Corridor Corporation of India Limited (DFCCIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Director Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBA, PGDM, and CA can apply for the DFCCIL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Director	01	MBA, PGDM, CA

DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 1,80,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 3,40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the DFCCIL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the DFCCIL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the email address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

E-mail Address:

eo2@rb.railnet.gov.in.

Important Dates:

Starting date	21-08-2025
Closing date	05-09-2025

 

Application Form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
